description: Email address of CSIRT of Freemail provider

emails.content:
Greetings,
please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.
Thanks,

FREEMAIL provider

Thanks for report,

it seem to be a fishing, sender has been blocked.

CSIRT

Greetings,

Thank you for looking into the issue.

FREEMAIL provider

Greetings,
our users are still getting phishing mails with a phishing form hosted in your network at https://nice-project.uni.ex/. Please take it down.

Regards,
FREEMAIL provider
Hi, do you still recieve spam allerts related to this page or not?

Greetings,

we are no longer receiving any alerts related to this website.

Regards,
FREEMAIL provider

description: Email address of Dr. Doe, who notifies CSIRT-U about the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm forwarding yet another phishing mail.

Best regards,
--
Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

On 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:


https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex

Your Account will soon be suspended
Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
"doe@mail.uni.ex"
Please kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex


<="" account="">
Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.
If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emails
This Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"

Sincerely
mail.uni.ex support team.

Thanks for report,

it seem to be a fishing, sender has been blocked.

CSIRT

Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm glad we have such great security team!

Dr. Doe

description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Hi Jane,

thank you for yours proactivity, this page looks suspicious and now it is blocked.


Your CSIRT

Oh no, our web needs to stay online as long as possible!

Regards,

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project
Oh, sorry we misunderstood your email, its back online

There are some issues with VM. VM team is working on fixes

CSIRT

HI, this response we get from VM admin:

"""Greetings

Thank you for your email. I’m out of the office and will be back at 27.11.2023. During this period I will have limited access to my email.

Best Regards,
Harris"""

CSIRT

description: Email address to university cloud provider

emails.content:
Hi, we recieved email, that this page is not working properly, could you take a look?
https://nice-project.uni.ex/

CSIRT

Copy of email:

To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Hello,

we just power off a virtual machine hosting this website. We do not have access to the VM itself.

Best,
Cloud provider
So you are unable to fix this issue?

Hello,

indeed, we cannot fix the issue. The only people that can look further into that is the admin of the VM and people authorized by the admin.

Best, 
Cloud provider
Ok and do you have any contact for VM admins?

The admin of the VM is harris@mail.uni.ex

Best,
Cloud provider

description: Email address of Mr. Harris, who is the VM admin/owner

emails.content:
Hi, we recieved email, that this page is not working properly, could you take a look?
https://nice-project.uni.ex/

According info we got from webadmins VM is down.

CSIRT

Copy of email:

To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Dear CSIRT-U,

thanks for notifying me, my team will look into the issue.

Best regards,
Harris
Hi, when you expect, the fix would be ready.

Greetings

 

Thank you for your email. I’m out of the office and will be back at 27.11.2023. During this period I will have limited access to my email.


Best Regards,
Harris
